text: Bioconductor project partial support Chan Zuckerberg Initiative Diversity Inclusiveness special program. brief summary project available. main objective project production open-source teaching materials can used engagement high-school undergraduate student underrepresented communities cancer data science. site created help encourage scientists Channing Division Network Medicine Harvard TH Chan School Public Health consider participating Dana Farber/Harvard Cancer YES CURE mentoring program.
